definition: number of written characters/number of words/word count
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The words of the equivalent of 19 AnLun times of enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 经论字数相当于十九部《菩提道次广论》。

sentences.english: My essay just about reached the necessary word count, but there's an awful lot of filler text in there.
sentences.chinese: 我的文章刚刚凑够字数，但里面有一篇糟糕的补白。

sentences.english: Word number restricts other content to be in collect virtuous child sina rich guest.
sentences.chinese: 字数限制其他内容在集贤子的新浪博客。

sentences.english: Words that are hyphenated (e. g. , "self-evident") or contracted (e. g. , "shouldn't") count as one word.
sentences.chinese: 有连字符或者缩写的单词怎样统计字数？

sentences.english: It doesn’t sound like much – but their word count soon adds up.
sentences.chinese: 这听起来并不多，但他们所写的字数很快地上去了。

sentences.english: Because want happen by chance sufficient this word number or the theme that want more abstruse place.
sentences.chinese: 因为要凑足这字数还是要比较深奥点的主题。

sentences.english: After a long time, the sky is just a word did not approach statistical big blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 过了半天，天空简直成了字数没有办法统计的大黑板。

sentences.english: Words that are hyphenated (e. g. , "self-evident") or contracted (e. g. , "shouldn't") count as one word.
sentences.chinese: 有连字符或者缩写的单词如何统计字数？

sentences.english: In our project, the total word count of translatable text is 5,400.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的项目中，可译文本的总字数是5，400字。

sentences.english: At the end of your paragraph write the number of words that you have used.
sentences.chinese: 在段落结尾处写上全段的总字数。

sentences.english: To achieve a balance between running heads with different numbers of characters, increased inter-character spacing is used for running heads with few characters.
sentences.chinese: 为使字数不同的标题间能取得平衡，需要加大字距。

sentences.english: Words that are hyphenated or contracted count as one word.
sentences.chinese: 有连字符或者缩写的单词如何统计字数？

sentences.english: The topic introduction has been copied from the task and is deducted from the word count.
sentences.chinese: 文章的开篇是从题目中抄来的，所以不能算字数。

sentences.english: Use your word counter on your software now.
sentences.chinese: 自己用软件上的字数统计来数一下。

sentences.english: Next, divide the total seconds into the number of words read.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，用刚刚所阅读的总字数除以总秒数。

sentences.english: It is the number of words is not restricted, but the requirement antithesis neat, tonal harmony.
sentences.chinese: 它字数多少不限，但要求对偶工整，平仄协调。

definition: main text (as opposed to footnotes)/main body (of a book)
length (of a piece of writing)/space occupied on a printed page
number of sentences/number of lines (in verse etc)
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
